Node.Text: "November 27, 1920. I'm entering the once-renowned Countryshire Apartments, where actors and singers used to stay. But now, tragedy has struck this high-class residence with the death of..."
I'm sorry, miss, but were you talking to me?
No, I'm sorry. I was recording myself so that I can write it down later.
I see. So what floor will it be?
Oh, never mind! I'll just walk back to my room, I have to write this down ASAP!
I see, so you're a reporter. So you're researching the accident that happened here?
It's kind of rude to ignore someone that's right in front of you. Anyway, which floor?
Sorry, normally people just ignore me and go about their lives. I was talking to my tape recorder, I'm working on a new story.
Well, if you say so. What floor, ma'am?
Never mind, I'll just walk back to my room. I have to get this down before I forget it!
I'm here because of an incident that happened awhile ago. I came in part due to the apartments' upper-class reputation, but now I'm very interested in the death of Mr. Lindson.
I have too many ideas I want to remember! I'll just walk back to my room. Thank you, sir!
